name: Palpatine Simulator 2000
description:
CELEBRATE THE #1 WINNER from the end of winter game jam and embrace the dark side.

Ewoks have come to register a complaint with the senate. YOU ARE THE SENATE. Show them the full power of your fully operational dark side by zapping each and every ewok into a powdery puff of nothingness.

WARNING: The ewoks may sneak up on you.

Clippy would like to remind you: USE TWO HANDS AND OBLITERATE THEM.
